org.lantern
Class Configurator

java.lang.Object
  org.lantern.Configurator

public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object

Configures Lantern. This can be either on the first run of the application or through the user changing his or her configurations in the configuration screen.

          Creates a new configurator.
